description: This source file defines the 'Message' class, representing a message entity in a chat or messaging system, including properties for sender, receiver, content, and timestamp.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Represents a message sent from one user to another with properties for unique ID, sender, receiver, content, and timestamp, linked to User entities.

methods.name: Guid()
methods.description: Generates a new unique identifier for the message ID.
